name: Transactor Systems
description: Both a prescription and procurement platform that is currently used in the global dental market that is has web and desktop based solutions which provide ordering, communications and invoicing as between dentists and dental laboratories.

jobs.title: CTO / WEB DEVELOPER / DATABASE MANAGER ROLE
jobs.description:
Looking for an entrepreneur who is also an exceptional web developer to code, manage databases and coordinate existing tech teams to ensure we reach our potential in return for an equity stake and a board position. 

We see an opportunity to disrupt a slow paper/post based prescription/ procurement system within the healthcare sector, with a new cloud based model. 

Initially the role will involve plenty of hands on development to integrate a web and desktop system with lots of future greenfield design and development.  You will also oversee an immediate re-launch and then help work towards the next investment round (in circa 6–9 months), following which there will be competitive market salary offered, plus further options.  Location is not necessarily important but easy access to London would be ideal. Flexible, in terms of the candidate’s time management, so long as realistic. A team player is key, someone who is comfortable working in a flat and relatively fluid structure.
 
The Board is realistic that change is hard to bring to industries, but, with revenue up 45% Jan 18 to Feb 19 as compared with the previous same 12 months, this is not a startup and thus provides an amazing (and realistic) opportunity which this role will be a key part of.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Looking for an entrepreneur who is also an exceptional web developer to code, manage databases and coordinate existing tech teams to ensure we reach our potential in return for an equity stake and a board position.

We see an opportunity to disrupt a slow paper/post based prescription/ procurement system within the healthcare sector, with a new cloud based model.

Initially the role will involve plenty of hands on development to integrate a web and desktop system with lots of future greenfield design and development. You will also oversee an immediate re-launch and then help work towards the next investment round (in circa 6–9 months), following which there will be competitive market salary offered, plus further options. Location is not necessarily important but easy access to London would be ideal. Flexible, in terms of the candidate’s time management, so long as realistic. A team player is key, someone who is comfortable working in a flat and relatively fluid structure.

The Board is realistic that change is hard to bring to industries, but, with revenue up 45% Jan 18 to Feb 19 as compared with the previous same 12 months, this is not a startup and thus provides an amazing (and realistic) opportunity which this role will be a key part of.
